description: NexusCleanupPolicy is the Schema for the cleanuppolicies API.

apiVersion.description:
APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object.
Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and
may reject unrecognized values.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description:
Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents.
Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to.
Cannot be updated.
In CamelCase.
More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

spec.description: NexusCleanupPolicySpec defines the desired state of NexusCleanupPolicy.

assetRegex.description: AssetRegex removes components that match the given regex.

lastBlobUpdated.description: LastBlobUpdated removes components published over “x” days ago.

lastDownloaded.description: LastDownloaded removes components downloaded over “x” days.

releaseType.description: ReleaseType removes components that are of the following release type.

format.description: Format that this cleanup policy can be applied to.

name.description: Name is a unique name for the cleanup policy.

nexusRef.description: NexusRef is a reference to Nexus custom resource.

kind.description: Kind specifies the kind of the Nexus resource.

name.description: Name specifies the name of the Nexus resource.

status.description: NexusCleanupPolicyStatus defines the observed state of NexusCleanupPolicy.

error.description: Error is an error message if something went wrong.

value.description: Value is a status of the cleanup policy.
